org.eclipse.keyple.calypso.transaction

Class SamSelection

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.keyple.core.card.selection.AbstractCardSelection<AbstractSamCommandBuilder<? extends AbstractSamResponseParser>>
      • org.eclipse.keyple.calypso.transaction.SamSelection

  • public class SamSelection
extends org.eclipse.keyple.core.card.selection.AbstractCardSelection<AbstractSamCommandBuilder<? extends AbstractSamResponseParser>>
    Specialized selection request to manage the specific characteristics of Calypso SAMs
    Beyond the creation of a CalypsoSam object, this class also allows to execute a command to Unlock the SAM if unlockData are present in the SamSelector.
    This unlock command is currently the only one allowed during the SAM selection process.
    Since:
    0.9
